title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 128 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 128 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）凡敬畏耶和华，遵行他道的人便为有福。

lineList.en: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
lineList.cn: 你要吃劳碌得来的。你要享福，事情顺利。

lineList.en: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
lineList.cn: 你妻子在你的内室，好像多结果子的葡萄树。你儿女围绕你的桌子，好像橄榄栽子。

lineList.en: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.
lineList.cn: 看哪，敬畏耶和华的人，必要这样蒙福。

lineList.en: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
lineList.cn: 愿耶和华从锡安赐福给你。愿你一生一世，看见耶路撒冷的好处。

lineList.en: Yea, thou shalt see thy children's children, and peace upon Israel.
lineList.cn: 愿你看见你儿女的儿女。愿平安归于以色列。
